name: Untitled Dungeon
description:
Wander a dark, dreamy dungeon and uncover a lost story.

  • Dusty tomes!
  • A chatty vampire!
  • Pumpkins!

This game might take 20-40 minutes to finish, depending on your degree of completion.

You can also stream or download the original soundtrack, which is also dark and dreamy.

Made by @terribleben, with sprites and tiles by @irondavy. Say hi to us!
